roleset.name: push upwards
roleset.note: BOOST-V NOTES: For usage of the other numbered arguments refer to 'raise' (from boost.01-v)
BOOST-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry boost.01, OntoNotes grouping boost-n senses 2& 3; maps to VN class promote-102. (from boost.01-n)

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: It is currently waiving management fees, which [*T*] boosts its yield.

example.name: with end point
example.text: Such devices have boosted Japanese investment in mortgage-backed securities to more than 1% of the $900 billion in such instruments outstanding.
example.arg: to more than 1% of the $900 billion in such instruments outstanding.

example.name: Arg 0 & TMP
example.text: The bond market got an early boost from the opening-hour sell-offin stocks .
example.arg: from the opening-hour sell-off in stocks

example.name: Arg 1, 3, 4
example.text: Then, just to make sure the union got off with a bang, it upped the boost of the motor from 1.4 to 1.6bar.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Sweet potatoes, known for their boost of vitamin A and C, are nutritious veggies,
